duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive product strategies for Buyer transactional risk, Seller credit risk, and AML and Prohibited/Restricted/Counterfeit item compliance.
Lead a global team of product managers, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts to achieve KPIs.
Analyze industry trends and data insights to identify new product opportunities and evaluate vendor offerings.
Manage the long-term vision, strategy, and execution for the risk and fraud management product portfolio.
Oversee the development and adoption of next-gen account linking systems for risk use cases.
Coach, mentor, and build an effective and dedicated product management team.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to synthesize short and long-term product capabilities and maintain a groomed, prioritized backlog.
Monitor and evaluate the performance of product strategies and communicate with leadership audiences.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in a relevant field (MBA preferred)
